name: Art From Chaos
imagePrompt: A swirling vortex of vibrant, digital art emerging from a stormy, noisy background. Emojis and Web3 symbols are subtly incorporated into the chaos, representing the transformation of 'noise' into 'culture'.
abilityText: Summon two 2/2 'Chaos Culture' tokens. Art from the noise.
flavorText: Some see chaos. Artists see a canvas. The algorithm sees engagement. Everyone's happy. Sort of.
